Methods

Animate<T>(T, params Generator[])

Applies childGenerators via TransformSequence.Append(IEnumerable{Generator})/>.

public static TransformSequence<T> Animate<T>(this T transformable, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators) where T : class, ITransformable

Parameters

transformable T

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

childGenerators Generator[]

The optional Generators for TransformSequence<T>s to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

DelayUntilTransformsFinished<T>(T)

Returns a TransformSequence<T> which waits for all existing transforms to finish.

public static TransformSequence<T> DelayUntilTransformsFinished<T>(this T transformable) where T : Transformable

Parameters

transformable T

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

A TransformSequence<T> which has a delay waiting for all transforms to be completed.

Type Parameters

T

Delay<T>(T, double, params Generator[])

Advances the start time of future appended TransformSequence<T>s by delay milliseconds. Then, childGenerators are appended via TransformSequence.Append(IEnumerable{Generator})/>.

public static TransformSequence<T> Delay<T>(this T transformable, double delay, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators) where T : class, ITransformable

Parameters

transformable T

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

delay double

The delay to advance the start time by.

childGenerators Generator[]

The optional Generators for TransformSequence<T>s to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

Loop<T>(T, double)

Append a looping TransformSequence<T> to this TransformSequence<T> to repeat indefinitely with pause milliseconds between iterations.

public static TransformSequence<T> Loop<T>(this T transformable, double pause = 0) where T : class, ITransformable

Parameters

transformable T

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

pause double

The pause between iterations in milliseconds.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

Loop<T>(T, double, int, params Generator[])

Append a looping TransformSequence<T> to this TransformSequence<T>. All Transforms generated by childGenerators are appended to this TransformSequence<T> and then repeated numIters times with pause milliseconds between iterations.

public static TransformSequence<T> Loop<T>(this T transformable, double pause, int numIters, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators) where T : class, ITransformable

Parameters

transformable T

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

pause double

The pause between iterations in milliseconds.

numIters int

The number of iterations.

childGenerators Generator[]

The functions to generate the TransformSequence<T>s to be looped.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

Loop<T>(T, double, params Generator[])

Append a looping TransformSequence<T> to this TransformSequence<T>. All Transforms generated by childGenerators are appended to this TransformSequence<T> and then repeated indefinitely with pause milliseconds between iterations.

Append a looping TransformSequence<T> to this TransformSequence<T>. All Transforms generated by childGenerators are appended to this TransformSequence<T> and then repeated indefinitely. milliseconds between iterations.

public static TransformSequence<T> Loop<T>(this T transformable, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators) where T : class, ITransformable

MakeTransform<TThis, TValue>(TThis, string, TValue, double, Easing, string)

Creates a Transform<TValue, T> for smoothly changing propertyOrFieldName over time using the given easing for tweening. PopulateTransform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>(TThis, Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>, TValue, double, in TEasing) is invoked as part of this method.

public static Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis> MakeTransform<TThis, TValue>(this TThis t, string propertyOrFieldName, TValue newValue, double duration = 0, Easing easing = Easing.None, string grouping = null) where TThis : class, ITransformable

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

propertyOrFieldName string

The property or field name of the member ot TThis to transform.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing Easing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

grouping string

An optional grouping specification to be used when the same property may be touched by multiple transform types.

Returns

Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis>

The resulting Transform<TValue, T>.

Type Parameters

TThis

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

MakeTransform<TThis, TEasing, TValue>(TThis, string, TValue, double, in TEasing, string)

Creates a Transform<TValue, T> for smoothly changing propertyOrFieldName over time using the given easing for tweening. PopulateTransform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>(TThis, Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>, TValue, double, in TEasing) is invoked as part of this method.

public static Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis> MakeTransform<TThis, TEasing, TValue>(this TThis t, string propertyOrFieldName, TValue newValue, double duration, in TEasing easing, string grouping = null) where TThis : class, ITransformable where TEasing : IEasingFunction

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

propertyOrFieldName string

The property or field name of the member ot TThis to transform.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing TEasing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

grouping string

An optional grouping specification to be used when the same property may be touched by multiple transform types.

Returns

Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>

The resulting Transform<TValue, T>.

Type Parameters

TThis

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

TEasing

The type of easing.

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

PopulateTransform<TValue, TThis>(TThis, Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis>, TValue, double, Easing)

Populates a newly created Transform<TValue, T> with necessary values. All Transform<TValue, T>s must be populated by this method prior to being used.

public static Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis> PopulateTransform<TValue, TThis>(this TThis t, Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis> transform, TValue newValue, double duration = 0, Easing easing = Easing.None) where TThis : class, ITransformable

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

transform Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis>

The transform to populate.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing Easing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

Returns

Transform<TValue, DefaultEasingFunction, TThis>

The populated transform.

Type Parameters

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

TThis

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

PopulateTransform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>(TThis, Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>, TValue, double, in TEasing)

Populates a newly created Transform<TValue, T> with necessary values. All Transform<TValue, T>s must be populated by this method prior to being used.

public static Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis> PopulateTransform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>(this TThis t, Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis> transform, TValue newValue, double duration, in TEasing easing) where TEasing : IEasingFunction where TThis : class, ITransformable

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> will be applied to.

transform Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>

The transform to populate.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing TEasing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

Returns

Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>

The populated transform.

Type Parameters

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

TEasing

The type of easing.

TThis

The type of the ITransformable the Transform<TValue, T> can be applied to.

easing TEasing

TransformTo<TThis>(TThis, Transform)

Applies a Transform to a given ITransformable.

public static TransformSequence<TThis> TransformTo<TThis>(this TThis t, Transform transform) where TThis : class, ITransformable

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable to apply the Transform<TValue, T> to.

transform Transform

The transform to use.

Returns

TransformSequence<TThis>

A TransformSequence<T> to which further transforms can be added.

Type Parameters

TThis

The type of the ITransformable to apply the Transform to.

TransformTo<TThis, TValue>(TThis, string, TValue, double, Easing)

Transforms a given property or field member of a given ITransformableTThis to newValue. The value of the given member is smoothly changed over time using the given easing for tweening.

public static TransformSequence<TThis> TransformTo<TThis, TValue>(this TThis t, string propertyOrFieldName, TValue newValue, double duration = 0, Easing easing = Easing.None) where TThis : class, ITransformable

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable to apply the Transform<TValue, T> to.

propertyOrFieldName string

The property or field name of the member ot TThis to transform.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing Easing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

Returns

TransformSequence<TThis>

A TransformSequence<T> to which further transforms can be added.

Type Parameters

TThis

The type of the ITransformable to apply the Transform<TValue, T> to.

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

TransformTo<TThis, TValue, TEasing>(TThis, string, TValue, double, in TEasing, string)

Transforms a given property or field member of a given ITransformableTThis to newValue. The value of the given member is smoothly changed over time using the given easing for tweening.

public static TransformSequence<TThis> TransformTo<TThis, TValue, TEasing>(this TThis t, string propertyOrFieldName, TValue newValue, double duration, in TEasing easing, string grouping = null) where TThis : class, ITransformable where TEasing : IEasingFunction

Parameters

t TThis

The ITransformable to apply the Transform<TValue, T> to.

propertyOrFieldName string

The property or field name of the member ot TThis to transform.

newValue TValue

The value to transform to.

duration double

The transform duration.

easing TEasing

The transform easing to be used for tweening.

grouping string

An optional grouping specification to be used when the same property may be touched by multiple transform types.

Returns

TransformSequence<TThis>

A TransformSequence<T> to which further transforms can be added.

Type Parameters

TThis

The type of the ITransformable to apply the Transform<TValue, T> to.

TValue

The value type which is being transformed.

TEasing

The type of easing.
